front.title: Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) Remote Direct Memory Access (RDMA) Direct Data Placement (DDP) Adaption

abstract.t: This document describes a method to adapt Direct Data Placement (DDP) and Remote Direct Memory Access (RDMA) to Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) RFC2960 [2] using a generic description found in [RDMA-Draft] [4] and [DDP-Draft] [3].
